content: I do think that this has to affect legacy, because there's no point in establishing invariants if there's a huge set of contracts that are exempt from them

author: .vbuterin
content: One way to get it into Osaka without making Osaka open-sesame for feature EIPs is if we explicitly say "Osaka is Verkle + the one gas-repricing to end them all"

content: Verkle requires gas repricings anyway, and I also made a draft EIP a couple days ago to increase gas costs of hashes, and this is also a gas cost change
